main event: A witness sighted a bright, luminous object moving erratically over Dayton, Ohio on November 7, 1969.
interesting points: The object was described as bright, luminous, and moving erratically before eventually disappearing from view.
Numerous attempts were made to identify the object, but no conclusive explanation was found.
The object was observed by the witness for approximately one minute before disappearing.
The witness indicated the object appeared to be approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter and circular in shape.
Radar operators at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base also detected several unidentified targets moving rapidly and erratically over the Dayton area around the same time.
